item.title: Beogram 4002 (Type 5504): Installation of Newly Adapted Beolover RIAA Pre-Amp

item.title: IIA addresses the challenges of internal auditing in the digital era
item.description:
Singapore’s fifth yearly Public Sector Internal Audit (PSIA) Conference, themed Rising to the Challenges of the Future, centered on economic shifts and transformations. The Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA), organizer of the PSIA, emphasized that organizations face mounting hurdles in our increasingly digital world, including cybercrime and technological disruptions. Consequently, internal audits are even more critical for strong governance in both public and private sectors. To maintain effective and independent assurance, internal auditors must embrace innovation and acquire new skills...

item.title: Beogram 4002 (Type 5513): Full Upgrade with SyncDrive Platter Motor, Commander Remote Control and Internal RIAA Pre-Amplifier
item.description:
A customer from Kentucky requested a full upgrade for their Beogram 4002 turntable, including three modifications: a SyncDrive motor for enhanced speed stability, a Commander remote control system for convenient operation and keypad protection, and a Beolover RIAA pre-amplifier for direct connection to modern audio equipment. All upgrades were installed without soldering. The SyncDrive replaced the original DC motor, connecting to existing mounting points and the main circuit board. The Beolover RIAA pre-amplifier replaced the output board, using compatible connectors for easy installation...

item.title: Beogram 4000: Installation of Newly Designed Beolover RIAA Pre-Amplifier Board
item.description:
Due to demand, I designed an internal RIAA pre-amplifier board for the Beogram 4000, adapting the circuit from my recent redesign for the DC motor Beogram 4002 and 4004. I installed this new board in a Beogram 4000 that was in for a warranty repair.
